entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Loche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:21 AM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
